pycopancore.process_types package¶

Submodules¶

pycopancore.process_types.ODE module¶

ODE process class.

ODE stands for Ordinary Differential Equation. ODEs are used for continuos processes in which one of the targets is dependent of the time.

class pycopancore.process_types.ODE.ODE(name, targets, specification, *, smoothness=1)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.private._abstract_process._AbstractProcess

Define ODE process class.

timetype = 'continuous'¶
type = 'ODE'¶

pycopancore.process_types.event module¶

Event-type process class.

It is used for processes that do not occur in regular timesteps. An event might be something like a birth or death, catastrophes of all sorts.

class pycopancore.process_types.event.Event(name, variables, specification, smoothness=0)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.private._abstract_process._AbstractProcess

Define Event process class.

timetype = 'discrete'¶
type = 'Event'¶

pycopancore.process_types.explicit module¶

Explicit process class.

Explicit functions are used to calculate variables to help other functions, for example calculate temperature from co2 level.

class pycopancore.process_types.explicit.Explicit(name, targets, specification, smoothness=0)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.private._abstract_process._AbstractProcess

Define explicit process class.

timetype = 'continuous'¶
type = 'Explicit'¶

pycopancore.process_types.implicit module¶

Implicit proccess class.

Implicit functions are not yet implemented.

class pycopancore.process_types.implicit.Implicit(name, variables, specification)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.private._abstract_process._AbstractProcess

Define the class Implicit.

timetype = 'discrete'¶
type = 'Implicit'¶

pycopancore.process_types.step module¶

Step process class.

A step process may be used for things that reoccur regularly. It might also be used for things that are continuos but are approximated by steps.

class pycopancore.process_types.step.Step(name, variables, specification)[source]¶

Bases: pycopancore.private._abstract_process._AbstractProcess

Define the step-process-type.

timetype = 'discrete'¶
type = 'Step'¶
